Uses of Class
fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.SystemService

  • Packages that use SystemService 
    Package Description
    fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.auth
    Services for authentication and authorization, and accessing user directories.
    fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.config
    Services for configuring ViewShell components and plug-in components.
    fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.connector
    Services for communicating with OpenAGE servers (and potentially other data stores).
    fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.data.views
    Interfaces for defining list navigation behavior for data sources made available by connectors.
    fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.design
    Services for working with default page types backed by data from default connector types, with default page workflow.
    fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.fs
    Services for working with real and virtual file systems, including file watcher services.
    fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.http
    Services for handling HTTP communications, including management of the embedded web server.
    fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.locale
    Interfaces for working with text and data representations that vary by locale.
    fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.themes
    Services for handling themes, including templates and stylesheets for pages.

    • Uses of SystemService in fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.auth

      Classes in fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.auth with annotations of type SystemService 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  IAuthnService
      An authentication service, capable of providing access control tickets based on information available in HTTP requests or from serialized tokens.

    • Uses of SystemService in fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.config

      Classes in fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.config with annotations of type SystemService 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  IConfigService
      Gets the configuration service for the ViewShell environment.

    • Uses of SystemService in fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.connector

      Classes in fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.connector with annotations of type SystemService 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  IPlatformConnector
      Connector to an OpenAGE platform server.
      interface  IPlatformService
      Provides methods for managing platform connectors, including adding, removing, and defining aliases.

    • Uses of SystemService in fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.data.views

      Classes in fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.data.views with annotations of type SystemService 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  IDataViewService
      Provides access to data-oriented views for users, including adapted customizations of default views.

    • Uses of SystemService in fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.design

      Classes in fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.design with annotations of type SystemService 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  IDesignService
      Provides access to pages bound to record sources provided by a connector, and manages page designs.

    • Uses of SystemService in fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.fs

      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  IFileSystemService
      Provides access to virtual filesystems and file-manipulation facilites.

    • Uses of SystemService in fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.http

      Provides high-level access to the embedded HTTP server.

    • Uses of SystemService in fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.locale

      Classes in fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.locale with annotations of type SystemService 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  ILocaleService
      Provides localization support as a broker between resources associated with specific locales and resources providing translated text representations.

      Provides and manages a specific type of templates, using a specific type of technology.
      interface  IThemeService
      Provides access to template systems.
